page.title: 11YELDERSLEY OLD HALL
page.content: {Yeldersley}is in the parish of {Bradley.}It is not a village and does not have a{church}or a{school}but it does have an old{hall}and a new{hall. The{Old Hall}is situated about half way up{Yeldersley lane.Yeldersley Hall is on the main{Derby}to{Ashbourne road.The old{hall}consists of two main buildings . The part by the road is the oldest ,about 200 years old, and is almost a listed building which means no-one can change it.The second part is used as outdoor buildings and living accomodation.There is supposed to be a tunnel from the old{hall}to {Bradley Church}.The entrance can still be seen.{Bonnie Prince Charlie}is supposed to have slept in the{hall over night. {By {Mark Hinds
